entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
